ai-patthana18.24:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.24:1.1_0: Seeing this, should be given up. Not knowing and seeing.
ai-patthana18.24:2.1_0: You shouldn’t give up arguing. Not knowing and seeing would be given up. For the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana18.24:3.1_0: Seeing this, you should not give up desire to, not give up one thing. Not knowing and seeing is a cause or condition for the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana18.24:4.1_0: Not knowing and seeing would be given up, relying on not give up.
ai-patthana18.24:5.1_0: You shouldn’t give up development of the three kinds of development. Do not give rise to the thought.
ai-patthana18.24:5.1_1: You shouldn’t give up development to things that should be given up, relying on not developed, and for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.24:6.1_0: You shouldn’t give up some things that should not be given up by developing.
ai-patthana18.24:7.1_0: You shouldn’t give up develop the principle that should not be given up, relying on letting go of develop, or one thing that gives rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.24:8.1_0: By seeing, you should give up the going forth and the sake of seeing. Not knowing and seeing, not for the sake of causeing.
ai-patthana18.24:9.1_0: Nor should be given up by dispelling. Not knowing and seeing, it should be given up by means of the Teaching.
ai-patthana18.24:10.1_0: Not knowing and seeing, you should give up cause or condition for the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana18.24:10.1_1: Not by means of a transmigration, no known by the mind should be given up.
